#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    if(!(t&(t-1)))
    cout<<"1";
    else
    {int k=0;
        
        while(t)
        {k++;
        //cout<<"lll"<<"\t"<<t;
        int i=0; //cout<<"hhh";
        while((pow(2,i)<t)&&(pow(2,i+1)<t))
        { 
            
            i++;
            
        }
        //cout<<t<<"\n";
        
        t=t-pow(2,i);
        //cout<<t<<"\n";
        if(!(t&(t-1))){k++;
        //cout<<"kli";
            break;
            
        }
       //cout<<"jj"; 
        
    }
   cout<<k<<"\n"; 
}
return 0;
}
